Keara is a Caucasian (American) with long black shoulder length hair and a single blonde streak across the front. She weighs in at 90 pounds and is at the age of 14. Her weakness is fast food such as McDonalads or Burger King etc. She mainly wears super skinny jeans and a tight tank top. She wants to stay skinny but will she lose her will power when a new fast food food place opens up down the street?

Nikki is a Hispanic with short brown hair that falls half way down her neck. She weighs in at 137 pounds and is 22 years old. She loves all pastries even though it's already started to show on her figure. She has a small potbelly no bigger than a quarter of a volley ball. Her butt, hips and thighs fit into size 12 jeans while her breasts are a C-Cup. She likes to wear tight dresses. She's in denial with her gain so far but will that still be the case when her dad decides to buy a bakery and brings her sweets every day?

Madison is a blonde white girl with hair that drops all the way to the small in her back. She weighs 110 pounds and is 17. She's the perfect stereotype of a blonde. She's an idiot! She is a chearleader at her school and wears her uniform everywhere she goes. (Except in the shower and when she goes to bed of course). She loves all things sweet but has a special spot for chocolate. Will she keep her figure or will a few trips to the candy store give her some unwanted fat?

P.S Sorry for the change on Keara. She was originally supposed to be Caucasian but auto correct changed it without me knowing.

11.title: Keara

choices: Keara ends up eating half of Chloes
111.content:
'Ugh, why does school have to be so boring?' Keara thought to herself. While Mrs. Wiley gave the class a lecture on history.
"Keara! Stop day dreaming and answer this question!" Mrs. Wiley yelled. Keara looked up at the board and saw probably one of the stupidest questions in the world.
"In what year did Abraham Lincoln fight against Vampires?" Keara read aloud. "Didn't that happen in a movie? Not real life?" Keara asked confused.
"If it was in a movie then it has to be true you stupid girl. Keara is obviously incapable of answering a question so Jamie how about you test your knowledge." Mrs. Wiley replied in a mean tone. That was probably the worst thing about history. Mrs. Wiley was probably one of the most brain dead teachers out there. Keara looked up at the clock. 'Yes only five minutes till lunch!' She thought happily.
"Umm... 1823?" Jamie guessed. Keara looked at Mrs. Wiley expecting yelling but all she did was sigh calmly and pick up her apple. She stared at it softly like it was a child and back at Jamie. Her calm face turned red with anger and she threw the apple hitting Jamie in the head. The sad thing was that even if the kids tried to report her, the principal wouldn't believe them. She acted like an angel when parents, teachers, the principal or even other kids were around but when it was just this class and her she would start to scream and throw things. Keara sighed happily to herself as the lunch bell finally rang and she could get out of that awful class.

'Hmm what should I get?' Keara thought to herself along with looking at the menu. 'Maybe I should get the chicken strips. Oh wait I forgot that it isn't actual "chicken" it's made out of tofu.' Keara thought to herself annoyed. She looked out through the cafeteria window and saw the Burgers R Us right across the street from them. She had a total of twenty dollars in money so she could easily get a decent meal there. Keara looked at her regular table and saw her friends Darian a nice African American boy and Chloe a beautiful blonde who unlike her older sister Madison was insanely smart. She knew she could probably get them to come with her as long as she paid. Besides who would want to eat alone? She got out of line and walked to her usual table. "Hey guys, would you want to come to Burgers R Us with me?" Keara asked happily.
"We didn't bring any money," Chloe replied sadly.
"Oh that's alright, I'll pay," Keara said happily. After some short discussing Chloe and Darian decided to go on the condition that they were allowed to get anything they wanted.

The group of friends left the school and went down the street to the fast food restaurant. When they got to the place they noticed stuff being packed up into a truck. "Do you guys know what's going on here?" Darian asked.
"No but I'll ask," Chloe replied. "Hey Kyle (the Burgers R Us manager), what's going on?".
"Oh were being relocated so this is our second to last day here. All of our food is free of charge today as a thank you to our customers," Kyle replied.
"Well that's really nice of you guys," Keara said thankfully. The trio went into the food place and stood in line. It was really busy in there so they had a long wait.
"Will this line go any faster?! If I'm late for History again Mrs. Wiley will kill me," Chloe stated. After a long wait it was finally their turn to order. Darian started off by getting a small Cheese Burger, Salad and a Diet Coke.
"That's all your getting?!" Keara asked surprised.
"I have to stay in shape for track and field tomorrow," Darian replied.
Keara unlike Darian decided to take advantage of the free food and ordered: 3 Double Bacon Cheese Burgers, 2 Large Fries, 3 Large Vanilla Shakes and 4 Banana Nut pies.
"Enough food Keara?" Chloe asked surprised.
"Its free so I might as well take advantage of it," Keara replied.
"Good point!" Chloe said happily. Keara waited off to the side while Chloe ordered her meal. "I'll have 4 Triple Patty Chicken Burgers, 3 Large Curly Fries, 4 Large Iced Teas and a Chocolate Sundae on the side," She said excitedly. It must have been 10 minutes before the girls food was ready and lunch was almost over. The girls took their trays of food to the table Darian saved for them even though it took 3 trips to get everything there. The girls started to dig in before Darian could've said something.
111.title: Let's Begin!

choices: Continue at home with her friends..
1112.content:
Chloe and Keara sat at the table moaning and groaning as about a quarter of their food remained on the table. "I've never been -Urp- in my life," Chloe said leaning back rubbing her swollen tummy. Her skin was as tight as a drum.
"I regret eating so nghhh much," Keara said trying to hold in a fart (She's embarrassed of her gas).
"Maybe you guys shouldn't of eaten twice your weight in food," Darian said snickering.
"Shut up," Chloe replied trying to get up. "And help me up" Chloe whined.
"Me too please," Keara added. They both scooted out from under the table. Darian grabbed their hands and pulled them up causing Keara to let out a small fart in the process. Keara blushed dark red and hung her head in shame.
"What are you doing?" Chloe asked Keara curiously.
"Yeah, we need to get back," Darian added. Keara looked up confused and realized they didn't hear it and put one arm around Darians neck and the other cradling her swollen gut. Chloe did the same. They trudged back to the school making it only minutes before the bell rang. Keara sat down her currently heavy frame in her seat causing her shirt to ride up a bit but she didn't notice. She prepared for her next class math...

choices: No! This story should be focused on Keara
11123.content:
Keara, Chloe and Darian sat on the couch in Kearas house while watching cartoons. Grrnggghh Kearas stomach groaned with hunger even though the food she recently ate hadn't even fully digested yet. Luckily for her there was no fat added on her, excluding the semi digested lump of food in her stomach. "Woah better calm that stomach down before it causes some sort of earthquake," Darian said laughing.
"I have no idea why I'm still hungry after that monstrous lunch," Keara replied glumly.
"Egh, don't get to upset I'm probably just as hungry as you if not more," Chloe said to her friend while rubbing her still aching belly. Chloe's wavy blonde hair was behind her shoulders and dangling near her upper back. Her face was just like her sisters. She had a cute button nose sparkling blue eyes and wore pink lip stick every day. She wore different colored tights in which resembled the rainbow. She wore different colored T-Shirts that would compliment her tights. She always bought her shirts and pants two sizes to small for her so she could show off some cleavage and butt even though there wasnt much to show off (excluding her butt). She currently wore Purple tights that might have been to tight and an already to small yellow shirt. Darian had very little hair on his head as he liked to shave it to get rid of an unwanted afro. He wore plain T-Shirts considering he didn't care what others thought of him. He wore track shorts almost everyday just in case someone wanted to challenge him to a race (Nobody usually did).

After some short goodbyes Darian went home and Keara and Chloe continued to sit on the couch with their still grumbling bellies. Except rather than eat , the friends decided to take a nap and home they would digest the food fully by then. Keara went into her room and slept almost as soon as she had gotten into bed. Chloe on the the other hand was having a hard time getting comfortable on the couch. Chloe sat up and walked into Kearas room. Luckily she had a double bed so Chloe could fit in there as well. She climbed in as quietly as possible and drifted off to sleep. Chloe dreamed about the perfect guy running towards her through a flower patch in an open field. It's 'cheesy', right? Suddenly the man stopped running. He turned around and started running away. Chloe looked behind her and saw a giant Hotdog about 30 feet high and 10 feet wide. Chloe started running in the same direction as the man did. She was finally going to get away from the beast when a force erupted and pushed her towards it. The Hotdog held her close to its face and a mouth opened and dropped her in. Chloe had to hang on to the edge of its mouth just so she could make sure she didn't fall in. She pulled herself out and jumped on the monsters bun. Doing this aggravated the monster and it reached desperately to grab her. Chloe used this as an opportunity and bit in to the monster. Chloe continued to take bites until there was only half of the actual Hotdog left. Chloe sat on the monsters shoulder and rubbed her overstuffed belly resembling an over filled basket ball. She let out a loooonnnnggg fart in relief. The monster then grabbed Chloe and chucked her into the sky. As soon as Chloe was about to hit the ground she woke up and her stomach grumbled in hunger.

Keara dreamed she was on a cruise ship she was attending a romantic comedy with a cute boy. They were just about to kiss when a loud splash was heard. She turned around and found a sea monster about 50 feet taller then her. It looked almost exactly like Gyrados from Pokemon except this one was made of Jell-O. Keara backed up in disgust when a sudden long wind picked her up and delivered her in the sea monsters mouth. Unlike Chloe, Keara was swallowed and the sea monster went back under water and swam away from the boat. Keara realized the only way out was to eat. She swallowed her saliva and started to attack the monster from the inside. She continued to eat until there was only a severed head left she saved it and used it to float up and above the water. She laid there in satisfaction, rubbing her belly which was the size of a small beach ball. She might of been rubbing her stomach to hard because a sudden loud burp erupted from her mouth causing her to blush sheepishly. Keara closed her eyes happily when the head swiftly turned to the side and Keara toppled over and woke up starving with hunger.

Thanks for reading but before we get to new options I have a quick question. Is Chloe going to be accidentally gaining with Keara?

1112311.content:
"What are you doing in my bed?!" Keara screamed in surprise.
"Shut up. I'm trying to sleep," Chloe replied groggily. Her chances of sleeping were gone unfortunately because Keara was now awake and splashed water in her face.
"What was that for?!" Chloe shrieked.
"Outta my bed fool," Keara said in a ghetto accent causing Chloe to laugh. Chloe got out of bed and the two friends went into the bathroom to brush their hair and then after sit on the couch. Grrrnggggghh Grrgghh Grrnnnnnggh. The girls stomachs were growling in pain saying feed me!
"Soo hungry!" Chloe groaned in agony.
"Same! Do you grrrrnnnrghnnnrghnnnngggh want to go to Burgers R Us? They're still serving free food," Keara asked.
"I really don't care. I just want to eat something," Chloe replied.
"Okay but we have to make sure we don't take to much. I felt bad for throwing out the rest of the food earlier," Keara stated in pain.
"Agreed, let's just get there before I eat your couch please!" Chloe exclaimed. Luckily for the girls Burgers R Us wasn't as busy as it was before (obviously because it was 8pm) so they were able to get food quickly.
"I'll have two triple patty bacon burgers, two large vanilla milkshakes and a large fries," Keara said to the cashier.
"And I'll have three king sized cheese burgers, two large chocolate milkshakes and an extra large fries," Chloe continued.
"Will that be all for you today?" the cashier asked.
"Yes and make it snappy were starving!" Keara replied impatiently. The cashier rolled her eyes and went into the back to get Keara and Chloe's meals. For acting so rude at the front desk the cashier decided to get a little revenge. She grabbed every single one of the pattys and dunked them in pure grease, she took the bacon and swirled it around in pure lard, she deep fried the buns, spread tons of butter on each bun, put extra salt on the fries and put tons of ice cream and sugar in the milkshake. She handed the girls their trays of food politely. They noticed the buns deep fried but were to hungry to care. They scarfed their food down very quickly for petite girls. Keara finished her first burger and gulped down her first milkshake. Chloe was already starting her second. Chloe finished her second burger and started shoving down her fries. Do to the salt increase she had to take a sip of her drink every few fries. Keara finished her final burger and started to chow down on her fries. She also had to take a sip of milkshake every couple fries. They both finished their fries and Chloe started to eat her last burger but could only finish half which Keara finished.
"I think we over did it again," Chloe groaned.
"Maybe just a bit," Keara replied. "You have some grease on your cheek," Keara said giggling. Chloe wiped the grease of her face with her fingers and licked it off. Unfortunately there was no Darian to help them up so they were forced to stand by themselves.
"Hnnnngghhhh" Chloe grunted trying to stand up. Her shirt rolled up to reveal her stuffed belly which resembled a small basketball that kids would use.
"Okay 3, 2, and 1, mmmmpppphhhhh" Keara groaned trying to stand up. Clink! Bzz Keara sat back down in defeat. Her shirt was rolled up which revealed a round tan ball about the same size as Chloes. She felt an odd pressure relief near her midsection though. She looked down and saw her fly unzipped and the button to her pants under the metal table. She blushed in embarrassment while Chloe just sat there jaw dropped and the cashier started laughing. Now with nothing to lose Keara hauled herself off the bench and stood up in victory. Chloe was thinking of trying something like that but she didn't want to risk her tights ripping. Eventually Keara was finally able to get Chloe up and the two waddled out of the restaurant. Keara now to embarrassed to even talk to her friend said good bye and went to sleep as soon as she got home.
1112311.title: Being inpatient gets you nowhere!

choices: Keara and Chloe just barely make it through tryouts without ripping any thing.
11123111.content:
Keara woke up that morning and went to the bathroom. She took a quick shower and went downstairs to eat a larger breakfast then usual having an extra bowl of cereal and 2 more eggs. She inhaled them quickly and chugged down her orange juice. She climbed up the stairs and looked for an outfit to wear to school that day. She stared in disgust at the buttonless jeans hanging on a rack for her mom to sew. She went through her clothing and picked out a pitch black formfitting skirt she had gotten a year ago. She pulled them up slowly having no trouble till she got to her thighs. She started inching the skirt up little by little till it got stuck just under her bum. She heaved but they wouldn't budge. With one last attempt she pulled with all her might and yanked them over her butt. Unfortunately doing this caused her panties to ride up and give her a major wedgie. Before she could take care of that she had to zip and button the skirt. The prongs slowly clipped together till it stopped completely half way. 'That will have to do' she thought. She grabbed the button and other flap and started to slowly pull them together. Little by little they got closer and in a desperate attempt she forced the button into the hole. Lucky for her they hooked but it was causing her to lose her feeling in her hips. Keara sighed. The only reason she was wearing that stupid skirt was because she wanted to get into cheer leading with Chloe. To do so she had to be able to be three things: Flexible (check), Perky(check), and look good in a skirt(half-check). She tried to reach down and pick at the wedgie but she couldn't even fit her fingers through! The skirt used to be able to touch her knees but was now scrunched up mid thigh. She grabbed a yellow tight tank top. Which showed a little bit of pudge on her belly. She decided to put on a blue Guess hoodie over it to hide her small gain and the straining button. She put on some flats and left for school.

On her way there she noticed Burgers R Us completely empty and a moving truck unpacking stuff with the logo Stuffed Sausage onto the patio. "Hmm wonder if their any good," Keara said to herself. She went through the front doors and found the school completely empty. She checked her phone and saw she was ten minutes before the bell. Keara thought hard about what was going on when it hit her. "Oh shit! It's spirit day!" She screamed running down the halls as fast as she could in the skin tight skirt (which wasn't very fast). She snuck into the gym and changed into her work out clothes quickly. Her next task was hard she had to sneak through the gym doors without making noise and quietly sneak into her class. Her first task she barely did as the gym teacher looked through his office door and just missed Keara running outside. She tip toed into her class and watched the event going on take place. She sat next to Chloe. "What event is this?" Keara asked.
"Relay race and it's about to start. Hey look it's Darian!" Chloe shouted excitedly. Keara wanted to cheer and support him but didn't want to throw off his game. The starting bell rang and Darians team mate Matt ran off with the baton. It must have been a minute before Matt showed up. The other team was about to lap him. But he was limping. "What happened?!" Chloe shrieked. He handed the baton to Darian who trailed behind the other team. Team A (Unknown people) were on their third lap and Darian handed the baton to Matt who went as fast as he could but you could tell he was still injured. Team A finished 17 seconds ahead of Team B.
"I hope you guys enjoyed the race. But unfortunately for Team A our security camera picked something up that might be a bit of a downer for your team," Principal Pumar said over the microphone. Everyones attention turned to a large screen which showed the guy from Team A kicking out Matts leg and him toppling over in pain. "Due to physical contact Team B wins by disqualification," Majority of the people cheered. Keara picked at her wedgie and stood up to do her event: hurdles. Keara walked down the bleachers and lined up for hurdles. The rules were being explained but Keara already knew everything there was to know. She had to jump over 15 hurdles in a 100 meter distance She got in to ready position but her stomach started gurgling. 'Oh no not now' she thought. The starting bell rang and Keara jumped over the first hurdle and then the second but then on the third as soon as she got over she let out a rather large fart from the pressure. Keara started blushing madly but kept going. The other girl looked back in disgust which caused her to crash into the fourth hurdle. Keara took this as an opportunity and passed the girl. By the 9th hurdle Keara started getting really tired and then when she got to the 14th she couldn't even jump over. She just jumped and tripped right over it. As she tried to get up the other girl passed her and won the event. Instead of trying to finish and be a good sport she just quit. As she walked up the stairs to where her friends were, she collapsed in a heap.
"What the hell happened?" Chloe asked surprised.
"Yeah, you used to be able to run that track in your sleep," Darian added.
"I dont know. I just couldn't go anymore," Keara said breathing heavily. The friends talked throughout the rest of the events as they had already done theirs. Darian was the only one to actually qualify for an event out of the friends. The events ended and everyone went back inside to prepare for their different classes. For Keara and Chloe that was cheerleading.

Keara changed out of her sweaty clothes and put on her super tight skirt, her tank top and hoodie. She met Chloe out side who was wearing the same tight skirt that Keara had except in white and a red tank top that clung to her body like a second skin. Keara stared at Chloe's belly which was bulging out a small bit. It wouldn't of even been noticeable if she wasn't wearing a skin tight shirt! In the middle of a conversation Chloe started to randomly pick at her butt.
"Stupid wedgie!" Chloe muttered.
"Chloe its fine I've got one to you just have to ignore it," Keara said to Chloe sincerely.
"Fine," Chloe groaned. The whistle blew and the girls lined up for cheer leading tryouts.
"Girls you look great in skirts so the first part is done. Now it's time to show us what you've got. Be perky, flexible and show us how great you are at cheerleading," The captain said.
"Do you want us to go change?" One girl asked.
"Nope, you'll be going through this in your clothes," the captain replied.
The girls both silently screamed 'What?!'.
11123111.title: A tight skirt and some gas

choices: The girl's make it to Chloe's house, but not without some digestive difficulties
Too stuffed to move, the girls wait it out.
111231111.content:
The potential cheerleaders were all lined up, trying to look as perky as they could. Huge smiles were plastered on their faces as the captain set up her clipboard. "Okay," she said, "I want you all to get in groups of four, we're going to start with some basic cartwheels. Keara was starting to panic, the way her skirt fit, any sort of quick movement was bound to rip it! She turned to Chloe, "Do you want to be on a team together?"

"Sure!" Chloe replied. The two girls found some others and got ready. The first round of cartwheels weren't bad, Keara and Chloe made it through without ripping anything, although their wedgies were becoming a real pain. "Damnit," Chloe whispered to Keara, "my stupid underwear keeps riding up." She picked at her panties while the other girls weren't looking, desperate to remove them from their wedge. "I know," said Keara, "I can barely focus with them like this." The two girls waited for their next round, stressing over their underwear.

By the time the next round of cartwheels started, Keara and Chloe had mostly dug their underwear out. But just before Keara was going to start, she felt her tummy give a small gurgle. "Oh shit," she thought, but went into her cartwheel. At the end of her last flip, Keara let out a loud fart right in front of Chloe. "Eww, gross. Who just farted?" The captain looked around at all the girls, who were looking at each other in confusion. While this was going on, Chloe's stomach gave a soft rumble.

"Hey Keara, can we go get some food after this? I'm really hungry." Chloe finished her sentence with a soft fart, barely loud enough for a mouse to hear, but still incredibly smelly. "Yeah sure," Keara said, but then she got a whiff of Chloe's gas,"holy crap girl, you stink!"

Chloe just looked down at her feet, "I can't help it, my tummy's been weird this last week."

The rest of cheer tryouts went out with only occasional flatulence, but by the end of it Keara and Chloe were exhausted. "Oh man, I haven't done that much in my whole life!" Keara sat down on a bench, her small, pudgy belly breathing in and out. "I know," said Chloe as she too sat down, sweat pouring down her body. "So, shower and then Burgers 'R Us?" "Okay."

After the girls showered, and struggled to get their skirts back on, they went over to Burgers 'R Us, only to find it had been replaced by Stuffed Sausage. "Oh yeah! This morning I saw a moving van taking here, maybe they switched owners or something?" Keara said as the two entered. What they were greeted with was a modern, industrial looking building. Metallic booths lined the walls and a long counter stretched across the back. The grills were hidden behind a brick wall. "Hello! Welcome to Stuffed Sausage, what would you like?"

The girls marveled at the prices. The largest meal on the menu, which contained 4 six-inch hot dogs and 1 foot and a half sausage, was only $6! "Umm, I'll have two of the Mega-Combo," Keara said. "Me too!" Echoed Chloe.

"Okay, I'll have your orders out right... now!" Suddenly, a part of the counter moved and a conveyor belt shuffled the meals out. After the girls paid for their meals and their drinks, and loaded their trays with ketchup and mustard, they sat down. "Wow! These things are massive!" Chloe said, just as her stomach roared, demanding to be fed. "I know!" Said Keara, as her stomach also begged to be filled. The two girls proceeded to eat their meals, savoring the flavors and spilling condiments all over their shirts and skirts as they tore through the sausage.

What the girls didn't know was that behind the brick wall was a large vat, filled with a mixture of "meat", lard, salt, and other chemicals that had nine-syllable names. The secret to the low cost of Stuffed Sausage was the low cost of production, and numerous health organizations had condemned the company for almost single-handedly causing massive amounts of obesity. But in the small town that Keara and Chloe lived, no one had heard about this new company, which made it perfect for business.

An hour and a half later, Keara and Chloe were filled to the brim. Their skirt buttons had popped off as their bellies had swelled to accommodate all that food. Their stomachs looked like soccer balls, and loud gurgles could be heard as their bodies digested the food. "Ugh, I don't want to move!" Chloe said. "Yeah, let's just wait this one out..." Keara sucked down the last of her pop, letting out a loud burp. "Hgnh, oh, that hurt to burp."
111231111.title: Disaster Averted?

choices: One week of junk food later at cheer practice...
Keara wakes up for a midnight snack, once again hungry, and binges.
1112311111.content:
Phhhhhrrrrrrttttt. Keara let out another fart and relaxed in her booth. Both her and Chloe had been in Stuffed Sausage for quite some time letting their bellies process the massive amount of junk they had eaten. Chloe had fallen asleep some time ago and was letting out soft, stinky farts while she snored. Keara was even starting to fall asleep when her phone buzzed. Digging into her now tight skirt, she pulled out her phone to see what was up.

"For the next twenty minutes only, all milkshakes at Stuffed Sausage are 60% off!!" Keara's phone said. Despite her belly's protest, Keara found herself oddly hungry at the mention of milkshakes. "Hey Chloe," she got up to wake up her friend, struggling to pull down her skirt while she did so, "are you still hungry?"

"BRRAAAAPPPPP, ah that hit the spot! What did you say?" Chloe stretched, revealing her now pudgier tummy for all to see.

"Are you still hungry? Because milkshakes are cheap right now." Chloe shook her head and got up, also pulling down her skirt, and walked over with Keara to the counter. Already a line was forming, all people wanting to take part in the new deal. Most were in similar states as the two girls: letting out farts while hungering for more junk food. After waiting for their turn, the two girls each ordered two deluxe chocolate milkshakes. The creamy sugar and fat laden drinks came in jumbo cups and the two girls left the restaurant.

"Mmm, this is sooooo good!" Keara said while she downed her shake. Forgetting that drinking so fast would give her a tummy ache and some serious: "Ah, brain freeze!" Keara stopped on the road and put her hand to her head, hoping that the pain would subside.

"Haha, you big dummy!" Chloe said while she sipped her shake. "What did you expect, you were drinking that like it was going out of style!"

Keara just glared at her and the two continued on to Chloe's house, slurping down the rest of their drinks. By the time they reached the house both were, once again but not for long, full. The changed into something much more comfortable than their skirts, specifically sweatpants, and settled into the couch to watch a movie. As they leaned back into the cushions, the effects of their junk food binge and shakes clearly showed. Their stomachs stuck out like two slabs of flab. Unfortunately for the two girls, most of the pudge had settled in their bellies and ignored the more womanly parts of their physique. A sever case of lethargy came over the two as they lounged on the couch, and soon they were fast asleep, all the while letting thier bodies turn more of the food into fat.

111231112.content:
Keara and Chloe started to sweat nervously as they were going to have to do flips and the splits in their skin tight skirts. The first thing they had to do was a hand spring. The girls were lucky and made through it without ripping anything. Keara next had to make a pyramid and the girl at the top would have to jump into Chloe and another girls arms. It all went well until Keara kneeled down over top of two girls. Doing this caused the zipper on her skirt to rip entirely off of one side. It didn't seem like anybody noticed but Keara still blushed red. The girl jumped off of the pyramid and Chloe and the other girl caught her. Their second to last task was to hold someone on their shoulders and then the person on top would have to jump off and do a flip. Chloe was unfortunately paired with Keara and she would have to lift a bigger body mass. Keara stood on Chloe's shoulders and Chloe slowly lifted her up. Do to the larger amount of weight and Chloe's lack of upper body strength she only got about half way before letting out a loud fart and then flinging Keara up in surprise. Keara launched forward and did a front flip and landed it but she heard a loud snap. It sounded like her panties snapped. Keara felt something brush her leg and then touch the floor she looked down and found her lime green panties laying in the middle of the gym floor. She quickly snagged them up and shoved them into the waist band of her skirt knowing her chubby belly would keep it from falling down. Chloe was lucky another girl got blamed for passing gas and was kicked out. The last and final activity was for the girls to do a front flip landing in the splits. Keara and Chloe started sweating.
